title: Beautiful film
review: Very beautiful both in story and visuals. A great film that moves you and leaves you very satisfied

title: Great movie
review: The best superhero movie since the Christopher Nolan's Batmans and one of the best movies in the last year. Very fresh, original and entertaining. I was impressed.

title: Very powerful
review: You feel like you are there, very stirring. One of Christopher Nolan's best

movie_title: Nausica√§ of the Valley of the Wind
title: Amazing
review: Truly an amazing movie. Simple but so masterfully done, Miyazaki's best IMHO

title: One of my favorites
review: The plot is deep and thought provoking. The mood captures you through brilliant storytelling. All aspects including the music, visual FX, story, and acting work very well to craft a very well movie.

title: So good
review: Very fun, original, and sincere. Does everything well that it sets out to do

title: Entertaining, but overrated
review: This movie was a game changer in its time, but I just barely watched this movie for the first time and after twenty years it didn't live up to the hype. The action sequences are way over the top and the story and premise really isn't that deep or mind bending.

title: Exploration of humanity
review: This film is very well crafted and is a great exploration into humanity and what makes someone/something human. The mood captures you
